title: New recruits to the state sector receive appointment letters
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Letters of appointment were given to 2,273 new recruits to the Public Management Service as Management Service Assistants at Temple Trees on Thursday 07 March 2011. President Mahinda Rajapaksa handed over the letters to the recruits at the ceremony. The recruitment’s have been done covering…
